name: ONU/Mt Union Football 2004 Quiz | NCAA Football | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Mt. Union

	Mt. Union won the game, but not without a struggle.  The Mt. Union Purple Raiders won 41-27, but trailed 27-20 late in the third period. They had never trailed during the entire 2004 season before this game.

questions.text: Who started at QB for ONU?
questions.explanation:
Corey Minnfield.

	Quirk, a sophomore had started every game of the season and was one of the 2004 team captains. Minnfield got the start, and threw for 221 yards and three touchdowns.

questions.text: Ohio Northern scored first in the game.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Mt. Union drove 68 yards in six plays on the opening drive of the game. The drive was capped off by a 33 yard pass from Zac Bruney to Jason Cavell.

questions.text: Mt. Union's game versus Ohio Northern, was their _____th game of the their 2004 season.
questions.explanation:
8.

	Mt. Union had come off a 57-0 win over Marietta in week seven.

questions.text: Which Ohio Northern player was leading the nation in both sacks and tackles for loss, heading into the game?
questions.explanation:
Jason Trusnik.

	Jason Trusnik had 14 sacks heading into the game, and recorded two more during the game. All four players had been named OAC defensive player of the week at least once during the season. Midlam was also named Div III National Defensive Player of the Week.

questions.text: Which team scored the games final 21 points?
questions.explanation:
Mt. Union

	Mt. Union was trailing 27-20 in the third quarter. They then had scoring drives of 82, 93, and 47 yards to end the game.

questions.text: Which Mt. Union player caught a TD pass and had a rushing TD?
questions.explanation:
Rick Ciccone.

	Rick Ciccone had 35 carries for 148 yards and a TD, he also caught five passes for 58 yards and a score.  He also returned a kick-off for 29 yards.

questions.text: Combined, how many turnovers were there in the game?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Corey Minnfield threw two interceptions for ONU, and Rick Ciccone fumbled the ball early in the third quarter for Mt. Union's only turnover.

questions.text: ONU had more total yards than Mt. Union.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Mt. Union had 505 yards from scrimmage, while ONU manged only 310.

questions.text: Which teams starting QB had more passing TDs?
options: They both had the same number
questions.explanation:
Mt. Union

	Bruney(Mt. Union) threw for 327 yards and four TDs, both were career highs. Corey Minnfield(ONU) threw for 210 yards and three TDs.
